website_summaries.verdict: These durable, reusable mats can help anyone grill like a pro.  Affordable yet highly rated by thousands of owners.
pros: These nonstick mats are a great way to extend the life of a barbecue
Built to handle up to 500 degrees
cons: Not ideal for searing or charring

customer_reviews.title: Ankeres link is a counterfit version of the real Grill Mat.  Make sure your link is to Grilloholics.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: It appears Amazon has corrected the auto link to Ankeres. It now links to the correct Grillaholics link to purchase. BEWARE: I have purchased four of these mats from Grillaholics and have been very pleased. The current 'buy it now" defaults to a Chinese counterfeit product that is made of unsafe material and of low quality. They have hijacked Grillaholics link. You will have to choose "other sellers" rather than the buy it now due to Amazon's defaulting to the lower priced fakes. If you purchased one from Ankeres, I highly suggest you return it as it is unsafe. This is what the fake buy now looks like: "Sold by Ankeres and Fulfilled by Amazon. Gift-wrap available. "
customer_reviews.author: Livingthepast

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I thought the idea was a good one but your juices puddle on the mat so you end up making a huge mess removing them. The meat doesn't really score marks like the picture shows and takes longer to cook n
customer_reviews.author: K. Skirvin

customer_reviews.title: Very Dissatisfied & Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I had this product last year and it worked awesome the entire summer. So I ordered a fresh set of 2 a few weeks back and I am very disappointed this time. It did not live even two grill sessions. It got worn out and even torn on the side after washing with simple dish washing sponge and water. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Decent idea, prerty bad implementation
customer_reviews.text: Left a plasticky taste on the chicken that was grilled on it the first time. The second try was with steak, and it stuck to the mat, and again left a plasticky taste. It was not over direct flame, heat was on medium low, and I had sprayed the steak with a grill specific non stick spray that was non-flammable
customer_reviews.author: Dread Shimmra

customer_reviews.title: A disaster!
customer_reviews.text: First time (only time) use was a total disaster. Followed all directions...chicken tenderloins grilled 4 minutes on each side. Two minutes into side two the grill was spewing black smoke from the mats (grill temp never got above 400). The chicken had specks of the mat stuck to it. Wasted $20 on the mat and we're also out the cost of the chicken. I just hope the grill is ok because it doesn't look (or smell) like it it. A total disaster. Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: CheeCha

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money. Grease sits on top of mat and can't cook meat on it.
customer_reviews.author: Redhead

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE my grill mats! I don't know how they work, but they really work. We did an entire quesadilla dinner right on the grill!! See my pictures and check out the beautiful grill marks on the chicken.
customer_reviews.author: BRamsey

customer_reviews.title: They work great for the first few times as long as you ...
customer_reviews.text: They are about what i expected after trying other on the market. They work great for the first few times as long as you keep the heat below 450. i know it says 500, but in actuality, its more like 450. Then after a few washings, they tent to need a little help with an oil, such as olive oil to keep fish and chicken from sticking to the Mat. So, all in all, they work as advertiesed to some extent.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This was been great for our old grill. The grill grates have no non-stick left on them and this is a great alternative to trying to buy replacement parts or a new grill. It works just as advertised and I have had no problems with melting/burning/scorching of the mat. Food is heated thoroughly and does not take much longer than cooking straight on the grill. I have recommended this to my parents and have bought as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Haschemeyer

customer_reviews.title: If you don't like scraping and cleaning your grill, you'll love these.
customer_reviews.text: My sons looked askance when I produced these mats, but were curious enough to try one of them at a family barbeque. One of them and my granddaughter's boyfriend stood watching to see when it would ignite. Much to everyone's happy surprise, the mat did what it claims to do, and although the cleaning of it required its own 'separate' place in the sink (they actually DO read directions), they were more than willing to do that instead of scrubbing the usually messy grill on our Weber. Their attitude is if these don't last very long, they themselves will buy more of them because they work so well. And, the grill 'marks' really do show on the meat as well.
customer_reviews.author: Great GrandmaTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Works great but can had a little tickle from the flame!!
customer_reviews.text: Been grillin it up with these, Steaks, burgers, chicken, hot dogs, brats, and vegetables with one minor issue. Holds all the grease and if it hits the flame just right the top of the mat does catch fire. Not so bad if you know how not to panic and like your meat tickled by some flame but can see people panicking and dowsing it with water, bad idea!! Other than that, cooks great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jared

customer_reviews.title: I'll be grilling more often!
customer_reviews.text: Clean-up is soooo much easier. Only downsides I found are these ... you can't get a single sheet to cover your grilling area if you have a very large grill. So, you will probably need multiple sheets and have a seam to dodge with the spatula. Some juices can still run down into the grill over the edges; but it is still much less clean-up than a fully exposed grill. Lastly, when I bought them I didn't know you are not supposed to use metal utensils ... so had to get a silicon spatula. That being said, this is still such an improvement over a naked grill ... I'm giving it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Texas Mom

customer_reviews.title: Made in China, surprise, surprise.
customer_reviews.text: Lord knows what standards are taken into consideration when this item is manufactured in China. We are in the midst of a global pandemic that has its origins there as is. I'm not so convinced that these mats or any others are TOTALLY safe in terms of coating and what leaches into the meat from them as they are cooked on top of the mats. These mats are the same as any others, they all claim they are everything under the sun, but they are all about the same.
customer_reviews.author: MAK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect grilling experience from start to clean up.
customer_reviews.text: These mats put the fun in grilling! I did not think they would hold up just by looking at them but they Work. They are definitely thicker and tougher than I thought. I only had to trim about one quarter of an inch off from one side on each and then perfect grilling. My food is easier to control and the BEST PART BY FAR is that clean up is a breeze. That's the best part. I definitely and highly recommend these mats.
customer_reviews.author: Philip R.

customer_reviews.title: Never want to grill without these mats
customer_reviews.text: These mats are GREAT! They prevent flare ups and I don't have to clean the grill after every time I cook. I love the mats for preventing the flare ups alone. After several months of cooking with the mat I noticed that one of the mats was starting to show signs of wear. I contacted Katie and she quickly sent me a replacement set. Grillaholics stood right behind their warranty. I highly recommend these mats and would purchase again. I can't imaging grilling without them.
customer_reviews.author: M. McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: We’ve needed a new grill for awhile...but when I saw these sheets I knew we could get another year or more out of it! Previously the grill cooked very unevenly and the flames had a mind of its own. With just one of these sheets my husband cooked everything evenly and perfectly. I put the dirty sheet (after it cooled down of course) on the top rack of the dishwasher. Unfortunately I learned the hard way that I can’t have anything else on the top rack. Most of the items had greasy black flakes on them and I ended up needing to hand wash the sheet anyway. (Disclaimer: our dishwasher isn’t exactly the best so it’s possible that’s the issue.)
customer_reviews.author: NikkiNoodle1127Top Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Saves cleaning your grill, heats, cooks evenly...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased overall and seems worth the purchase. Pretty easy to use. I would use cooking spray though when cooking on them. It seems to assist in the cooking, avoids meats, fish sticking as much. Definitely need to carefully clean them each time you use them to get any residue, sauces, blood, off. Haven't tried using the dishwasher to clean them yet but, certainly a handy option. Be careful not to use abrasive scrubbers, will pull off the teflon like finish. I have not had a problem with the but it appears it wouldn't take much to damage them if you scrubbed too hard. Glad I purchased them!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Skillern

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This mat works great! I guess I've been living in a cave and didn't realize these existed. A friend recommended these and I thought I'd give one a try. I found these inexpensive mats and wasn't very optimistic. I was wrong! These are simple to use, prevent the grill from getting dirty, prevent smaller food items (shrimp, vegetables, etc.) from slipping through the grates, and are easy to clean. I grilled a salmon steak last week on my mat. Even though the salmon steak broke apart, it remained on the mat and made it to my plate without slipping through the grate. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ranger

customer_reviews.title: Barbecuing Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband as a 'Gag Gift' He opened it and laughed. The we tried it over the Christmas Holidays. Lamb- perfect - Steak perfect - Salmon perfect - Veggies perfect and Burgers perfect. The grill mat, browns the dish. Why it works? Magic, that is my estimation, but then it was Christmas. We used Avocado Oil to grill, or used Olive Oil. Our choice, depended on the grilling temperature. We added Rosemary Salt or Celery Salt, and fresh ground pepper, the Salmon, we marinated first. Very easy to clean, soaked a bit in the sink with dish washing liquid and the residue came off. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mertus

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fish, veggies and anything you don't want falling through the grill grates!
customer_reviews.text: We recently bought a Rec Tec and love cooking everything on it. We wanted to try fish, but needed something that kept it from falling through the grates. The Grillaholics mat worked perfectly when we tried salmon and tilapia! We have used it many times since then for vegetables and more fish. I love having two--one to use while the other is being washed, or when we're hosting a group of friends since both mats fit nicely on the grill, allowing us to cook larger quantities.
customer_reviews.author: aspires2b

customer_reviews.title: Not Really Grilled Food...
customer_reviews.text: Have only used this once with some marinated chicken. The food cooked but it ends up like something you would make in a fry pan rather than grilled. I now understand this is just a way to not use your oven or a fry pan, rather than some miracle thing that allows you to have the great grilled flavor. I use a gas grill which may be part of the issue. The chicken cooked but came out shiny, the mat had bits stuck to it that took quite a bit of scrubbing to remove. So clean up was not a breeze and flavor not there. Will likely not use again. Maybe for baking cookies or something.
customer_reviews.author: Constant Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gill Mats!  Highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.text: The mats performs exactly as promised in the advertisement! Nothing sticks and the mats are very easy to hand wash right after use. I do not get the grill marks that other reviews have experienced, but that maybe because I do not cook at an extremely high temperature, this has no affect on the taste however, everything is delicious! I have cooked chicken, hamburgers, and salmon on these mats and the results have been outstanding every time with no complaints. Cheese and sauce wipe away with no issues. I extremely pleased with these mats and would purchase them again from this company, but since they have a free replacement policy that should not be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Ecugrad

customer_reviews.title: and love it. It kept the BBQ sauce on the ...
customer_reviews.text: I tried it, and love it. It kept the BBQ sauce on the chicken, and was perfect. I would highly recommend this to anyone purchasing. Just a small warning, I do not believe I read before I purchased: You cannot use your regular BBQ metal tools, you have to use Silicone utensils. Otherwise we have cooked with these mats three times, and love it. No more food lost between the grates. My grilled veggies have never been better, better than those metal pans. The spare ribs from tonight kept all their sauce, and were cooked with perfection.
customer_reviews.author: Joanne M Cassick

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: love this product. I have some at home and some in the RV. I especially like to use these while camping. Makes clean up a breeze on the road. Just let them cool down and hand wash with a little dish soap. It protects the grill attached to my RV from getting dirty and having to be replaced as often. Also helps to keep food from burning on the grill. Gave some to my son for christmas for his new gas grill and he is able to keep the grill looking new and food safe from bacteria.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This does the job!
customer_reviews.text: I have an electric grill for which cooks REALLY well but very often the meat sticks to the grill. This was the perfect solution. It actually works pretty well with chicken to my surprise, as long as you do as they suggest, which is make sure you remove as much moisture as you can to alleviate it from sitting on mat. I also want to add their customer service is AWESOME. I have emailed them a couple of times and received very warming responses. This mat will not necessarily be for everyone but it definitely works for our family. THANKS!
customer_reviews.author: DJ LookUp

customer_reviews.title: but I'll start by saying I love this mat
customer_reviews.text: I have no clue where to begin...but I'll start by saying I love this mat!! Had a huge gathering yesterday and aside from the burgers, I had hot dogs and vegetables and fruit that came out terrific! I was so excited about the food not sticking or burning I forgot to take pictures. I'll post more the next time but very durable mat, no problems at all. Food literally slides around the mat and gets perfect grill marks. I need to order another set since 3 mats would be perfect on my grill. Very impressive product!!
customer_reviews.author: Devin H.

customer_reviews.title: it will be a mistake to say that this mat is a life savior and that it is just as great as putting your steak or chops on the grates
customer_reviews.text: For someone who knows how to grill meat really well, it will be a mistake to say that this mat is a life savior and that it is just as great as putting your steak or chops on the grates. Your meat will not have that char taste or look. Maybe for some people who like their BBQ looking as if though It has been sautéed this mat is a find, but not for me. The only thing it works well is for making a few types of vegetables
customer_reviews.author: ElenorY

customer_reviews.title: Great way to grill meats with no mess
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time, Looks great! We used these to cook burgers with grilled onions. Put a couple of pats of butter on one side for the onions. The burgers were very lean which usually means that if you are not careful, all of the juices drip onto the burners, making a mess, and drying out the meat. But with the Grill Mat, the meat was cooked to perfection, the onions were just right. No grease on the burners. No mess. These mats will make a great gift for yourself, or for your friends. Cleanup was as advertised; wipe off with a cloth, and then wash with soap and water. Thanks Grillaholics!
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill mat.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical when I placed my order. I had purchased a mesh mat ans was very unhappy with it. I had to soak the mesh one overnight and it still did not clean well. I looked at many different mats and read many reviews. This mat had what I like and great reviews. The packaging cones with 2 mats and has a gaurantee. That is a major plus for me. The first time my husband used it he was very pleased. We have used it with marinated meat that is always messy to cook. The cleanup was a breeze. I highly recommend this grill mat.
customer_reviews.author: nhlynn

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Works just like they said it would. All you get is the flavor of what you cook; so no weird taste. Cooks like you had it on the grate itself. Perfect for those campsite grills (that you don’t want to use for fear of what critter crawled across it and usually those grates are rusted). You get a clean surface. We cleaned excess grease off the mat with dish soap and threw it on the top rack of dishwasher; it came out perfect! Ready to use again. I was skeptical when my husband bought these, not anymore. Highly Recommend the grill mats, you will not be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Gatorgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product,great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I like this product ,ive had a few different ones from various companies this one is about equal in comparison that being said only reason i gave 4 stars is because lean meats like pork loin still stick a bit ,if its chicken wings then not so much But if you lower the temp its better But their customer service is awesome an that means alot,they even sent us a second set free so cudos on the customer service
customer_reviews.author: Dennisg

customer_reviews.title: It is amazing. No sticking
customer_reviews.text: I have used the Grill Mat while grilling chicken, elk burger and salmon. I also grilled squash on it. It is amazing. No sticking, no flame flare ups. Everything I grilled cooked very nice and I was totally satisfied with the results. Best of all was the clean up. The Grill Mats cleaned so easy. Just dish soap and warm water and in a few minutes all done. I had this product recommended to me, so after using them, I highly recommend the use of the Grillaholics Grill Mat.
customer_reviews.author: awg49

customer_reviews.title: A total winner!
customer_reviews.text: Love it! We had to work on cutting it down to the right size because the first try didn't let any air to circulate and the grill kept going out. Second try, though worked like a charm. It's great for camping because the mess can be easily cleaned up and no residue in the grill to attract animals. It Browns things really nicely, even leaves the grill lines.
customer_reviews.author: Gene in Denver

customer_reviews.title: stands up to heat
customer_reviews.text: I have both a gas grill and a Weber kettle. The Weber with charcoal gets MUCH hotter than the gas grill does even at full heat and I was worried this thing wouldn't hold up. While it seems flimsy, it holds up well. Not sure how long it will last, but you get two for the price which is great and getting a sear on veggies and two-minute fish is great! Clean up is easy too. I stick it in sink and a couple swipes with a soapy sponge is all it takes. It can go in the dishwasher, but I think this is easier and takes up less room.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Connor

customer_reviews.title: Mixes results.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in my first use. You do get grill lines on meats, but not on the peppers I grilled along with them. The meat cooked much more quickly on the mat than straight on the grill, which I like. But it is a mess to clean up. My biggest disappointment is that the mat partially melted on my first use. I was careful to keep the grill temp at 350°, but even so the mat got grill marks too! I'll keep using it as long as I can, but I don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: Doogie

customer_reviews.title: Very good Grill mats
customer_reviews.text: I love that these mats eliminate the need to clean the grill after each cook. I like that grill marks appear on the meat as it cooks. Everything grills very evenly. I do find them fairly easy to clean. I have cleaned them in soapy water and also on the top rack of my dishwasher. But after using them for about a month, their shape is becoming very “ripply”. Once the meat is placed, it does flatten out. Overall, I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B.Desjardins

customer_reviews.title: this works great. It is relatively easy to clean - the ...
customer_reviews.text: As far as a mat is concerned, this works great. It is relatively easy to clean - the only issue is that it's flexible, so hard to do in the sink if your sink is divided. There is no negative effect on taste. I do think that it's not fair for them to advertise this for steaks and burgers. Burgers require high heat, as steaks do during searing, and this material is not designed for those temperatures (which the seller/manufacturer admits). I use it for medium heat foods like shrimp and it works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: Banjo

customer_reviews.title: I love not having flare-ups!
customer_reviews.text: This thing works just as advertised. I was constantly having flare-ups on my gas grill, no matter how clean it was. I was to the point of grilling with the lid open and constantly monitoring it. I have only used the grill matt twice so far, but there have been no flare-ups, and it cleans up quite nicely. I did put it in the dishwasher the first time after removing all the excess grease, and that was fine, but the second time I just washed it with soap and water and it worked like a charm. Will update at the end of summer to let you know how it performed. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: A grills best friend!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. My first introduction to a grill Matt was a cheap dollar store version. I thought it was brilliant, but being cheap and of low quality it soon expired. I loved not losing food between the grill grates and soon sought to replace it.from the moment I opened the packaging and felt these grill Matts I knew I had made the right purchase. Last night I did some shrimp, they were done in a jiffy and the clean up was easy. I definitely recommend them to anyone who enjoys grilled meals but not the mess and clean up.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Understood

customer_reviews.title: Surprising but true
customer_reviews.text: Hard to believe that this piece of material does what it claims but it does. Used then to grill veggies worked very well. Veggies got roasted (a few rolled off the mat), clean up was easy- much easier that the grill basket. Grilling veggies was the main reason for purchasing but planning to try grilling fish with the mats. I see that they can even be used in the oven for things like lining baking sheets. Plan to give that a try also.
customer_reviews.author: mj

customer_reviews.title: Recommend without hesitation
customer_reviews.text: The mats work really well. There isn't any noticeable loss of heat or wood flavor, and the grill lines still show up on chicken and burgers just like if you had them against the bare grill. Cleanup is so much easier now that I don't need to scrape and clean the grill each time I use it. Just grab the dirty mats, wash them off and let them dry overnight. I have a fairly large rectangular grill and the two mats overlap just a bit to completely cover the surface. When I inevitably destroy these mats from neglect I will definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Keeps things on, not in, the BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I can't think of what else to say, other than these grill mats are really great! I did a Salmon on one the first time out the gate, and it was so easy to manage. No pieces falling through the grill, and the moisture stayed on the mat, and that contributed to keeping the fish moist. It especially helped when I covered it end to end with butter. Smoked Salmon, covered in butter..... not much of anything better under butter. Just ask your local Bear. Enjoy now Friend
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery L. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Grate Product :)
customer_reviews.text: OK, I'm not a BBQ guru but I know how to grill with the weekend warriors (reverse searing, hot/cool zones). The pit masters may frown upon this, but I can't recommend it more. I just cooked salmon and shrimp on this thing and it was such a treat. Salmon was seared almost as though I was using a pan. Shrimp browned and were delicious and all were accounted for. No sticking, no grate issues. Cleaning seems to be easy. I'd buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: cohocook

customer_reviews.title: This is a excellent product. I purchased it because I bought a ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a excellent product. I purchased it because I bought a new grill and I wanted to get grill mats and based on the rebuilt purchased it. I used it with burgers, sweet Italian sausages and BBQ chicken and nothing sticks. The clean up was easy and my grill was clean no issues. Just make sure you adhere to the temperature warning of staying below 500 degrees. I will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Orville Tait

customer_reviews.title: Tough to clean
customer_reviews.text: This product worked okay in terms of allowing items to grill on it, but we then had a heck of a time getting it clean. It took considerable scrubbing the first couple of times. Then we realized it was meant to be dishwasher safe, so after some light food removal we used the dishwasher and ... ruined the mats. They came out of the dishwasher with one hole and several spots scuffed through. What a disappointment! If they're harder to clean than the grill would be, they're no use to us. Very sad.
customer_reviews.author: D. Spurlock

customer_reviews.title: A True Believer Since Trying These Great Mats
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical that these mats would work. Boy, was I wrong. wanted something to keep my gas grill grates clean. These work to perfection. I simply wipe then off after each use. As advertised they even brown the meat surface and show grill marks. Also the company has emailed me several times making sure I am satisfied and offering other suggestions. They are truly customer oriented. I will but more mats in the future for other grills I have. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Robert T. Borremans

customer_reviews.title: Great grill mats
customer_reviews.text: The grill mats function as described and are a lot better than grilling on the grilling grates. Everything remains more moist when grilled on the mats instead of grilling on the grates. They are easy to wash. I cut the mats to fit the surface area of my gas grill. So far, so good. I would recommend these mats to those who grill a lot. Less clean up. Grilled items taste good.
customer_reviews.author: John Sachs

customer_reviews.title: Awful, just an awful product.
customer_reviews.text: These are a ridiculous waste of money, time and effort. Food does in fact stick to them, if you try a little oil to prevent sticking it just smokes something terrible, and they are impossible to clean. I tried soaking immediately in hot soapy water after using but it did nothing to remove the burned on food.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling veggies and clean-up is a breeze.
customer_reviews.text: Well Packaged and arrived in perfect condition by the promised delivery date. Very good value. The first time that I used the grill mat, I prepared grill peppers, onions, and mushrooms sautéed in olive oil. The veggies were perfect and clean-up was a breeze. Previously I used steel trays and sprayed them with Pam... no amount of scrubbing gets them completely clean.. Highly recommend the Grill Mat.
customer_reviews.author: DB Lever

customer_reviews.title: I love the concept of these and they work well but ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the concept of these and they work well but you need to read the fine print. After one use, our grill had basically burned the back of them even while maintaining the grill well below their maximum temperature. I’ve used them a handful of times and they seem to be sort of flimsy and I’m questioning how long they will hold up. They are also a pain to clean because you have to scrub to get the food off of them. I have not washed them in the dishwasher but I know that’s an option too. Overall, I’m happy with what they do but I question their durability.,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for some but not for all meats
customer_reviews.text: Great for some uses..,but fatty foods and burgers will pool in their own juice and will be like frying. Still have to throw them on the grill at the end if you want some chairing.. Works best for Filet and less fatty meat. Can also use at the start of fatty steak and food to not have as much fat run into your que'. but throw on grates at the end. Good for small and crumby items that may fall through the grates.
customer_reviews.author: Lou G

customer_reviews.title: One Word
customer_reviews.text: I'm not really sure what most people would use this product for (other than keeping their food off of a grungy grating), but the idea for me was the ability to cook a certain type of wild mushroom (Giant Puffballs) on the grill— because normally, they need a flat surface to cook on (such as a griddle or frying pan) to contain the necessary oil. I really didn't think that the skinny piece of flexible material would work this good, but it did. Mind = blown. The one word: "awesome".
customer_reviews.author: J. Brandt

customer_reviews.title: Cooking on Gas!
customer_reviews.text: I got two of the for Father's Day for two guys in my life. One cooks on gas, the other cooks on charcoal. The one that cooks on charcoal used these first and is having a hard time getting them clean. The one that cooked on gas had no problem getting them clean. I feel that cooking on a grill tastes fantastic, charcoal being my favorite, but with these mats, it makes a tremendous difference. I have even cooked stir fry on them! I have used others in the past, but after a few uses they would start to flake and get into the food. These have not. Thanks for making a great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to clean.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the surface when I first used it, however, what I cooked caused a mess on the mat that was extremely difficult to clean. The idea of these grill mats is good, but they need to be remodeled. I worry about the surface chelating onto the food.
customer_reviews.author: N. Daley

customer_reviews.title: Can't have grill without these
customer_reviews.text: I love these - have gotten them in the past. I let my last one's get overheated with a grease fire from bacon that I didn't pay attention too and they got charred, so I had to get more right away. I cut potatoes into thick slices and pour a little oil and salt/pepper and grill, they are so awesome - I also use sweet potatoes with a little oil and brown sugar. Just watch that the sugar doesn't burn - delicious!
customer_reviews.author: CocoLoco

customer_reviews.title: WORKS AS ADVERTISED!
customer_reviews.text: Used these mats for the first time this weekend and they performed excellent! I used one mat to cook sausage patties on a gas grill and it worked flawlessly. I used a paper towel to blot the excess fat oil from the mats as the patties cooked. Heat distribution was excellent and the clean up was easy. After drying I just slid mat back into the cardboard packaging to store it flat. Great product Grillaholics!
customer_reviews.author: MKWood

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: A Great item! I was not sure it would be as easy as it shows, but it really is that easy to use, clean, and store. I was skeptical about getting the heat, grill marks, and if there would be any taste issues. Grill marks are there! Heat is fine, and no reaction to cause any taste issue. This is GREAT for grilling fish and cut vegetables. I bought another set to give to my nephew who is now into grilling.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Bad Oscar

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.  Perfect for your hard earned money.
customer_reviews.text: These mats are really well made and stay in place while your cooking unlike others. It instantly opens your grill up to pretty much anything you were not able to cook before. I cooked some Cod today on my charcoal side and the taste was mind blowing. I was never a fan of fish to begin with now I can't wait to cook more. The cheese burgers I made was a bit too messy so I don't recommend them. A+ Buy
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded my Expectations
customer_reviews.text: I have never used grill mats so I was skeptical despite the great reviews, but these things are great. They are completely non-stick and you can still get grill marks through the mat. I have a small round grill and was able to trim these so they fit perfectly. If I wasn't so crappy at arts and crafts it would look like the mat was made for my grill but alas, it's obvious they were cut, no fault of the mat. I cooked what I believe is the ultimate test for them, fish fillets and they came out perfect. I think of things to cook on the grill now that I wouldn't have even attempted before.
customer_reviews.author: CAZ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for grilling unique things!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this grill mats to use at the boat, first time I used them was to cook Philly cheese steak with onions and peppers - it was amazing. Everything cooked to perfection although it did take a little longer than anticipated. The mats are sturdy, easy to clean, and reusable. Next I am going to try breakfast - pancakes and fried eggs. These mats have really extended my culinary options on the grill!
customer_reviews.author: Jaci Miller

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I hate how hard it is to clean the grill so I decided to try these grill mats. I was a little skeptical - but I was pleasantly surprised when I actually used them. They fit perfectly on my grill (although they can be trimmed to fit if needed). I've made a few things on them now and am happy with the results. The only issue I had was that the juice from the steaks ran off the back and down into the grill so I still had to do a good cleaning of the grates - but that may be user error! I'm so glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Just a great addition to your grilling arsenal. The mat is the perfect grilling surface. You get grilling marks on your meat and cleanup is as simple as it could be. In addition to selling a great product, the seller is outstanding. No sooner had I received the grilling mats, I was contacted by the seller to make sure I received the mats, and to remind me that the product has a lifetime warranty, By the way, each package contains two mats. I highly recommend this product and this seller.
customer_reviews.author: Ray S.

customer_reviews.title: No more grill cleaning!
customer_reviews.text: Had friends recommend this grill mat. It does a super job, keeps the grill clean and easy to clean up. You do have to heat the grill up longer than normal to get the mat hot before cooking, especially if you want grill marks on your food. We have not tried the other uses, but plan to in the future (Eggs etc)
customer_reviews.author: FozCat

customer_reviews.title: Great For Chicken Wings
customer_reviews.text: I made a batch of garlic parm wings on my new grill mats from Grillaholics. They came out great. The grease didn't drip down into my grill causing a fire. It stayed on the mat and allowed the wings to fry in it. The spices, sauces and cheese I put on the wings stayed on the wings. And best of all the wings still had grill marks and tasted grilled. Cleanup was easy once you dump the grease off the mats and throw in the sink. can't wait to try fish.
customer_reviews.author: Yellingj

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It’s very flimsy and hard to wash after use. Imagine trying to clean baked on grease and food off a magazine page. All the juice runs off the mat and ends up in the bottom of your grill anyway, so you are actually creating more cleanup work for yourself. It’s too expensive for a one time use but that’s about all it’s good for. Skip this and get a metal one.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: I have been a member of Amazon since 2007 and this is the first product I wasted my money on and gave a poor review
customer_reviews.text: Ok, washed grill mats as advise, followed instructions. Used four times @ 500 degrees as specified and every burger stuck to grill mat including the one sprayed with Pam Grilling spray. I burnt my hand several times trying to move mat back to original starting because burger was stuck to it. I have been a member of Amazon since 2007 and this is the first product I wasted my money on and gave a poor review.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent results
customer_reviews.text: I've used the mats for chicken, which has constantly gotten sooty before on direct heat. The mats allowed the skin to crisp, without letting the grease reach the burners and flare. I do this after cooking the pieces on indirect, so the amount of grease the mats had to hold was not too much. If you are doing something fatty for a longer time, you will need to use paper towels to dab up excess grease, else it will go over the side and cause flares. Easy to clean and store as well.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Shelley

customer_reviews.title: Totally satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: Whoa, these are great. I am not a grillmaster by any means...but this really makes it easy to cook on the grill. I've used it 5+ times so far...nothing but good experiences. Very easy to clean. Grills perfectly! You still get the grill lines on your food. The best part about using this is you don't (or barely) have to clean the grill when you're done. A must have product!
customer_reviews.author: Zman

customer_reviews.title: Not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Tore the first time I used it while using a silicone spatula. I clean them by hand with soap and water and they still have a greasy residue. I will be getting the thicker ones next time. I've been cooking at 400-450 degrees. The other mats go all the way up to 600. Not that I cook at that heat. I can still use these in my oven to catch the occasional drip
customer_reviews.author: EOS

customer_reviews.title: How DId We Live Without These Before?
customer_reviews.text: While these are the most amazing grill matts we've used, they are tough to clean. Keep that in mind. They work well with ribs, too, keeping the meat from falling into the grill itself. They also help cook a great rib eye! We did skewers, too, and this matt kept the skewers, themselve, from burning (woods ones...I know I know). Anyway, this matt is worth it, all the way around. We might try it when we camp, too.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: They fit my table top grill perfectly, no trimming required. The grill marks do come through. The mat cuts down on flare ups and keeps food from sticking to the grates. Easy clean up in the sink. Best part is no cleaning of the grill with metal brushes. Doctors are warning against it due to people ingesting bristle particles and perforating their throats/guts. So glad I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: sharon

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I loved using the grill mats. I bbq’d sausages, burgers and hotdogs and they cooked to perfection. I didn’t have use a high heat. Low was really good enough. The clean up was the second best thing. No cleaning the bbq grill. Just take paper towels, wipe mat/mats off and wash with very warm soapy water, rinse well, put away until the next bbq. Can’t say enough good things about this product. Makes barbecuing fun, easy and fast. Regards
customer_reviews.author: Sue E Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Non stick and easy clean up
customer_reviews.text: I am on my second set. After about three years they still worked fine but I thought a new set would be easier to clean. Love them. I use on the outdoor grill and they are great for keeping marinades from making a mess. I also use on a built in grill on my stove. Before grill mats I never would use it because clean up was a pain. Great for fish and veggies too.
customer_reviews.author: Lees

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It worked, but using an open flame on the grill cooked the food better. If you have to have your grill perfectly clean to put food on it, then this is for you. If you don't mind using a brush to clean your grill, stick with that. I threw mine away after 5 uses. I gave them a fair shot. They were more work than they were worth.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Great product - easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Brother-in-law introduced me to it, so ordered this set of two. It makes grilling items that are traditionally difficult, so much easy with no food sticking or falling through the grill grates. It is durable, easily washable and reusable. Great for fish, shrimp, steaks, etc. it is so nice to not have to start or follow a grill cooked meal with endless scraping of grill grates.
customer_reviews.author: RWS

customer_reviews.title: Happily Surprised
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I was a little skeptical when I opened the package and found these 2 super thin sheets. Me and my girlfriend both agreed that the mats were going to melt. We both stood in front of the grill as it preheated and then placed the matt on the 500 degree grate waiting for it to melt never happened. The matt works great for us as we always would lose shrimp and our veggies falling through the grate. The matt works as advertised nothing sticks and cleans up quickly with just soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Szypula

customer_reviews.title: Once you use them, you will ALWAYS use them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never had anything like this before but once you use them will will ALWAYS use them! Wow! talk about fast and easy clean up and keeping your grill and food clean . The flavor is just as amazing as any normal grilling and I think adds to making less grilling mistakes. I can not emphasize how easy the clean up is for both the grill and the product. Give it a try, you will be happy you did!
customer_reviews.author: WarriorEddieG

customer_reviews.title: great product, great service
customer_reviews.text: In the short time we've had the Grillaholics Grill Mat we've found that it grills a variety of foods-burgers, salmon, asparagus-extremely well. The product is very reasonably priced given that it is a pack of two. We had a problem with delivery that was due to our absence from the house. The Grillaholics took care of the problem quickly. They are friendly people who are committed to providing a great product to customers. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: S.T. Campagna-Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are the 2nd set of grill mats I've had. They're thinner than my first set and performed poorly. Food stuck so I started using a little oil. Still stuck just a little. Not supposed to use abrasives for cleaning however you can't remove the residue from the stuck food with just a sponge. In addition, they became misshapen after a couple of uses (wavy). The only positive is they help keep the grill clean. Definitely wouldn't recommend them. Not nearly as good as the first that I got as a gift (don't recall brand).
customer_reviews.author: docjoc

customer_reviews.title: Best kept secret for grilling!
customer_reviews.text: I love using these mats! I grill salmon, steaks, veggies on the mat. Careful with using marinades with sugars, as the sugar burns. Put bbq sauce on the chicken at the end of cooking. And the cleanup is amazing. Toss it into the sink, rinse off and while eating and put some dish soap on it and let it soak. Just cleans off so easy. Not like the metal grills. And it cools down fast too. And keeps the grill clean. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Shapiro

customer_reviews.title: Great product and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I've only used it once, but seems to work well. Clean up was easy, just a little soap and water. I'm really hoping they stand up well over time and last a while. Great value. One more quick thing, their customer service is top notch. I ran in to a small issue with my order, one of the mats was creased in the packaging. I contacted them about it, and they sent me a brand new one. I received it within 4 days of first contacting them. Great customer service and a great product, really can't has for anything more.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnie S.

customer_reviews.title: Worked great--easy clean-up
customer_reviews.text: Used this grill mat on a gas barbeque grill & it worked great. Nicely browned the outside of the meat as if it were directly on the flames & cooked the interior consistently to medium-rare(my preference). Also made clean-up extremely easy. Just removed mat & hand washed with mild soap in the sink, came clean & ready to re-use instantly. A great product. I know what my friends are getting for the holidays(when you live in Las Vegas all year is grilling time). Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzman Jack

customer_reviews.title: Work great & easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: I'd been looking at these for a while, and finally decided to try them. They work great! Just be careful that you don't go over the recommended temperature of 500F. I rarely get my grill that hot, so I'm good. First meal was a filet mignon and asparagus, and they turned out extremely well. Cleanup is a breeze - I do mine in the sink rather than the dishwasher, but it only takes a few minutes. Wish I'd gotten them while my grill was still new and clean. But no more scraping the grates now.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Farley

customer_reviews.title: Grilling cleanup made it EASY
customer_reviews.text: I like when we grill but cleaning up can be a chore!! I was little worried about getting this as I read some other reviews about it burning. This was not the case for us. As you can see it laid flat on the grill and blended well. It didnt burn at all and was easy to clean off. It kept the grill clean and saved us the headache of scrubbing down the grill after use. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Farrier

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not so durable....
customer_reviews.text: These worked good while they lasted, unfortunately I only got about 10 uses out of them before the nonstick qualities went away. Cleaned them with hot water and a soft sponge after each use, no detergents,. Maybe I took care of them improperly, but thought I was being super careful with them. Wiped them dry with microfiber and stored them in a drawer laying flat.
customer_reviews.author: Greg F.

customer_reviews.title: These mats work great, especially when we grill pizza
customer_reviews.text: These mats work great, especially when we grill pizza! We've used them for grilling all sorts of vegetables and fish with no worry about losing the food between the grates! Because the cleanup is so easy, I'm also going to use them in my oven when I expect messy spills when baking. We liked them so much that we ordered more as a gift for our sons that enjoy grilling. We had a delivery issue with our gift order, but Grillaholics customer service was outstanding and made sure we received our order in time to gift our son with these great mats. Thank you again for your awesome customer service!
customer_reviews.author: K. Jones

customer_reviews.title: The maiden voyage was a success!
customer_reviews.text: First thing I did with this mat was to make spicy grilled shrimp at about 375 degrees. The finishing sauce I used was a spicy sweet Chile that would have made a sticky mess out of my grill grates. With the grill mat, the shrimp were cooked just right, the grill grates were spotless, and cleaning the sticky mess from the mat was just a quick minute under some hot soapy water. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: T. Harper

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than our small Patio BBQ
customer_reviews.text: We love this mat! Mostly it creates even heat for fabulous moist cooking. No more dry rough tough outside with an undercooked inside. Beef, chicken, fish, vegetables--we've done it all and we love it. Surprised, but pleased. It is a bit bigger than our patio size BBQ, but it doesn't matter if there is a little overhang. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: K. Rieder

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Much better than the copper mats
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Much better than the copper mats. I soak it in the sink with detergent after each use. Scrape off any residue with a plastic spatula and then rinse. Good to go again. It does appear to have less things stick the more it is used. Don’t know if is possible for some of the grease/oil from grilling to soak into the mat or not. It just seems to get better with seasoning. Maybe it is just my imagination. Shows grill marks. This is very good product and I would recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: What a great and handy product. At last i can put my BBQ chicken on my grill without all the mess. Once finished cooking i simply leave it to cool, scrape anything stuck on there straight into my garbage can and wash then in my sink with dish soap and water. Very useful and I'll certainly get plenty of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Gav

customer_reviews.title: A new essential for my grilling.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used the mat once, and it seems to work as advertised. I may well upgrade my rating after using the mat for a variety of purposes, but I need more of a sampling. LATER: I can now say that I am delighted with these mats. I get nice grill marks, and heat certainly seems more evenly distributed. In addition to pork chops and brats, I have grilled vegetables, and everything was done to perfection. Nothing stuck to the grill and clean-up was simple. The grill requires no attention, and the mat wipes off easily before going into the dishwasher. I intend to purchase more of these as gifts for grilling buddies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cook great, cleaning..... not so much
customer_reviews.text: They have been awesome for making some of the best burgers i have ever grilled, but clean up is not as easy as it states, you can put them in the dishwasher, but only after you have hand scrubbed them clean, and you do not want to leave them on the grill any longer than you have to or clean up becomes a real task.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Clark

customer_reviews.title: Love These Things
customer_reviews.text: After using these, I'll never grill again without them. Keeps my burners and grilling grate clean, and still I get the stripes on my steaks. Takes a bit of experimenting to learn how to set temperature and when to turn the steaks but once you figure it out, the results are great. Makes grilling fish and vegetables easy. Giving a set to my friends and family for Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill Mat
customer_reviews.text: The Grill Mat has exceeded my expectations. Because of the easy cleanup, I grill almost every day. I have an electric grill outside on a porch and is easy access to my kitchen. I can grill meat and vegetables at the same time and they are delicious. It has grill marks on the food as advertised. I have even used it for bacon and eggs (be careful of the bacon grease dripping off the mat into the grill - use paper towels to carefully dab it up). I have used it many times already without any visible wear on the material.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Schaaf

customer_reviews.title: Best grill mat's you will find anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using grill mats for the last 4 years and have been amazed by the difference in brands. Hands down these are the best grill mat's I have ever used. The list of things on how to take care of them are clear and concise. I follow them exactly and it is worth it! It takes less time and effort than others I have owned and it keeps them looking like new and doing a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy A

customer_reviews.title: Giving it a overall excellent
customer_reviews.text: Make sure to follow the directions for use and cleaning! It took quite a bit of dish soap to get the mats clean, which is my only nit. These items performed as advertised, and they even left nice grill marks on the burgers I grilled. I didn't rate flavor but the burgers were really juicy and had lots of flavor since there wasn't any drip through. If I had to cook more on the same mats, grease management would have required a towel, but 6-8 are probably manageable for the grill time required.
customer_reviews.author: Stan

customer_reviews.title: This was a total surprise and wow!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim not expecting anything other to see what it does. I makes grilling salmon and other things like kabobs super easy. When pieces fall off they are on this mat, but it also grills with the grill marks on the meat like it was sitting on the grille frame. VERY happy with this item's performance and use. No more chunks of dinner falling through the grille and disappears into the bottom abyss!
customer_reviews.author: R. English

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves this grilling mat! He has never cooked steaks so tasty - they cook in their iwn juice, they have the Grill lines! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic product. My boyfriend and I are obsessed! Cleaning is a breeze and we’ve used it several times without cleaning and the hunk still comes off after a week. Wouldn’t recommend leaving it for a week though! We wanted to experiment and see how long it would hold up with all burnt food particles. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Thavy L. Chhun

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I've used this mat a few times and couldn't be more happier with it. The pork steaks were very tender and didn't dry out like in the past. Still had the grilled flavor and marks on them. The only suggestion I would have is not too over load it. I'm learning from experience but thinking about ordering a couple more. Recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: David M

product_meta.title: Grillaholics Grill Mat - Set of 2 Heavy Duty BBQ Grill Mats - Non Stick, Reusable, and Easy to Clean Barbecue Grilling Accessories - Lifetime Manufacturers Warranty
feature_bullets: THE #1 GRILL MAT FOR PRO GRILLERS! Did you know that our Grillaholics Set is the ONLY grill mat recommended by Rachael Ray and Chris Kimball for top resutls? It is the best value and quality in bbq grill accessories! Try yours RISK-FREE before we sell out! You may want to consider getting TWO - one for you and one for your best friend!

SAY GOODBYE TO GRILLING MESSES… Now you never have to BBQ on a nasty, dirty grill grate again! Our heavy duty mat prevents your food from falling between the grates or sticking to your grill! Enjoy grilling like a pro with our reusable and dishwasher-safe grill mats that make cleanup a breeze!

TESTED AS THE 100% PEFECT SIZE! Did you now that after running tons of tests, thicker mats does not mean better? We developed our grill mats to be thin enough to leave grill marks and robust flavor intact, yet thick enough to provide ultimate heat resistance and durability. With our Lifetime Guarantee, 2 mats is all you'll ever need. NEVER buy another grill mat again!

THE ULTIMATE GIFT FOR GRILLAHOLICS— Are you looking for the perfect gift for that special man or woman in your life? Our Grillaholics Non-Stick Grill Mats make great gifts for Father’s Day, Birthdays, Christmas, Mother’s Day, 4th of July, Labor Day, and Memorial Day! Become the Grill Master Pro you’ve always wanted to become!

SAFE FOR ALL OF YOUR GRILLING NEEDS! Our cooking mat works with any kind of barbecue grill— Weber, Charbroil, Big Green Egg, smoker, propane, gas, electric, or oven. These premium grill toppers are made from premium heat resistant PTFE-Fiberglass coating and contain no PFOA, silicone, or other harmful chemicals. Plus, our grilling mats can withstand temperatures up to 500° Fahrenheit and will not burn. Keep your family safe with a brand you can trust.
